document.full_text: liz elting, c.e.o. of transperfect, a translation service, said having many jobs at an early age helped to shape her view of the type of person she wanted to hire.
document.title: corner office: liz elting: a work ethic shaped at an early age
lines_and_colors: liz elting, c.e.o. of transperfect, a translation service, said having many jobs at an early age helped to shape her view of the type of person she wanted to hire.
